examples: This Dodger is mine uncle’s parasite,
The arrant’st varlet that e’er breathed on earth;
He sets more discord in a noble house
By one day’s broaching of his pickthank tales,
Than can be salved again in twenty years  […]

entries.meaning: A sycophant, a yes-man; one who meddles, tattles, informs (often in order to curry favour).
examples: He is a man still swayed with the first reports, and no man more in the power of a pickthank then he.
